entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h except 80 gusting to 100 through mainland inlets and valleys early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except northeast 70 gusting to 90 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
